text_block_list.name: Colleague Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
――Ah, Bubble Gum Fellow, huh? That girl was quite the 
hot topic among Uma Musume who haven't debuted yet.

While having a meal with my colleagues, I asked them about 
Bubble Gum Fellow. It seemed like everyone knew about her.

text_block_list.name: Colleague Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
――If I recall, her father runs a pretty large race 
club and she pretty much became their ace, right?

text_block_list.name: Colleague Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! She was called one of the 『Elite Four』 of the club. 
One of the four girls forging ahead towards a very bright future.

text_block_list.name: Colleague Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
And even among them, Bubble Gum Fellow seemed particularly notable. 
According to rumors, she was called the 『Tip of the Spear』

text_block_list.name: Colleague Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
The number of veterans aiming for a contract with her 
is pretty high, supposedly. I hear the rumors all the 
time. ……She sounds like the Elite of the Elite.

text_block_list.name: Colleague Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
――Aaah～, if only I wasn't a rookie, I'd want to 
try raising an Uma Musume with potential like her.

Ever since that day, I've really wanted to talk 
to Bubble Gum Fellow. But, it wasn't because I 
wanted to try forming a contract with her――
I just wanted to ask her

At that time, why was Bubble Gum Fellow so easily 
able to challenge Symboli Rudolf to another match――

――But, a few days had passed and I still hadn't talked 
to Bubble Gum Fellow. I was still feeling apprehensive.

To help clear up this mood, I went shopping for snacks at the campus 
store……then, I happened to see the bubble gum on the shelves.
……I remembered. The awe I felt at seeing Bubble Gum Fellow.

Why didn't I just run up and talk to her in that moment? 
I just wasn't able to.
choice_data_list: If I had talked to Bubble Gum Fellow――

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: ――How about talking to me now?

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Hey, how are you? 
I'm Bubble Gum Fellow.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
――This, is really good isn't it? 
I get it pretty often.

Bubble Gum Fellow was looking at 
the bubble gum I had seen. ……But, I――

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Huh, really? Which means――If you grab some now, 
it'll be the first time you've tried it.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
This might be some kind of fate. How about trying 
to blow a bubble? Hey, I'll even teach you how!

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
――Right, just like that. Now try opening your mouth to 
spread your upper and lower teeth just a little. Now 
press your tongue against the gum to stretch it a little……

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, looking good! Now, after this, 
just blow in to it slowly. Give it a try.

I blew my breath in to the gum like she said. 
But, it expanded a little and then burst……

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Nice challenge! For a first attempt, that was more 
than enough. Once you get the hang of it, you'll 
be able to expand them even bigger in no time.

It was a sudden course in how to chew bubble gum, 
but thanks to Bubble Gum Fellow's positive attitude, 
I found myself more absorbed in it than I expected.

And now……I realized the apprehension I was 
feeling earlier was gone before I knew it.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: Okay. What is it?
choice_data_list: Why did you challenge Symboli Rudolf?
Why did you challenge Symboli Rudolf?

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
…………Aaah! So you were watching the parallel 
running that day!? So, 『Why?』 did I do it?

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: To put it simply, it felt like a 『Chance!』 to me

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: Yeah. You see, I――

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
――will become one. 
――――An Uma Musume strong enough to change the entire racing world.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Which means, I should experience it for myself. Directly 
from someone who actually did shake up the entire racing 
world, with the strength to become a 7-crown Uma Musume.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
If you're going to aim high, then you will have to actively 
tackle difficult things that make everyone else think twice.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Parallel running with the Prez, is exactly that don't you think? 
That's why I jumped in.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: Debuting has nothing to do with it. Am I wrong?

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Dreams are something that can always be expanded. 
In that case, taking a step towards that dream is 
something that can be done at any time.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
And the only one that can decide when to take that step forward is me. 
――That's it.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Well, then. I think I'll get back to training now. 
After all, I have that rematch with the Prez coming up.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
……I think right now, you're also facing some difficulties too. 
So you can break open a new path, I'll be cheering for you. ――See ya!

……As I silently bid farewell to Bubble Gum Fellow, 
I could feel something welling up in my chest.

I have a dream I want to nurture. How should I act to move 
towards that? It wasn't my position that would decide it.
The one to decide that was――――
